oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Getting on / compiled by Dirk Geens
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bennett, Alan, 1934-
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: text_and_corpus_linguistics
Plays -- Great Britain -- 20th century
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Forms part of the Louvain corpus of modern English drama deposited in 1983. The text does not conform to modern standards of text encoding. The text is all capitals, with words broken over line boundaries, undocumented markup characters, and numeric codes for the identities of the players.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Oxford Text Archive, University of Oxford
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Although this resource has been deposited with us, it is not currently available for re-use by others.
